responsibilities: Build high-quality, clean, scalable, and reusable code by enforcing best practices around software products and platforms (Code Reviews, Unit testing, etc.)
Build low-code/no-code GenAI Platform tools using ServiceNow Platform capabilities and frameworks
Work with the product owners to understand detailed requirements and own your code from design, implementation, test automation, and delivery of high-quality products to users
Design software that is simple to use to allow customers to extend and customize the functionality to meet their specific needs
Contribute to the design and implementation of new products and features while also enhancing the existing product suite
Be a mentor for colleagues and help promote knowledge-sharing
qualifications: Passion for JavaScript and the Web as a platform, reusability, and components
Experience with data structures, algorithms, object-oriented design, design patterns, and performance/scale considerations
Experience with any of the modern UI frameworks like Angular, React, or Vue
Ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders across teams
analysis:
The job responsibilities include building low-code/no-code GenAI Platform tools using ServiceNow Platform capabilities and frameworks. The mention of "GenAI Platform tools" directly indicates that the job involves working with Generative AI. The other responsibilities focus on software development best practices, product design, and mentoring, which are common in many software engineering roles. However, the specific mention of GenAI tools is a clear indicator of involvement with Generative AI.

The skills listed do not explicitly mention Generative AI or language models, but they include general software development skills such as JavaScript, UI frameworks, and design skills. These skills are relevant to building and working with GenAI tools, especially in a platform development context.

Overall, the explicit mention of building GenAI Platform tools in the responsibilities confirms that the job involves working with Generative AI.
